thread.title: Police: USF football player fired gun on campus at dorm
thread.title_full: Police: USF football player fired gun on campus at dorm

title: Police: USF football player fired gun on campus at dorm
text: UCLA Football Player Arrested On Suspicion Of Rape 00:51 A UCLA football player was arrested on suspicion of rape in connection with an October 2014 sexual assault that occurred at an apartment off campus, police announced Friday. Adam Searl, a 20-year-old walk-on punter from Irvine, was arrested Thursday, according to the Los Angeles Police Department. Recent related news A University of South Florida football player has been arrested and accused of firing a gun at a dorm on campus. WEAR ABC 3 3 hours ago - US You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
